content.raw:
Thanks for looking into this! The `gz sdf` tip is great, much quicker to check!

I'm trying a few combinations and as far as I can tell, the `<collision name="inflation">` doesn't seem to do anything; the tag is being added to the first anonymous collision it finds and the name is not added to the collision. I'll try a few more things here, this is already great help, thanks!
content.html:
Thanks for looking into this! The gz sdf tip is great, much quicker to check!

I'm trying a few combinations and as far as I can tell, the <collision name="inflation"> doesn't seem to do anything; the tag is being added to the first anonymous collision it finds and the name is not added to the collision. I'll try a few more things here, this is already great help, thanks!
